mysteryDungeon:EvasivenessDropPower.NAME: Evasiveness Drop
DESCRIPTIONS: Ennemy loses 25% of their Block at the end of the round.

mysteryDungeon:LeechSeedPower.NAME: Leech Seed
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, it loses #b HP, and you gain #b HP

mysteryDungeon:NoHealPower.NAME: No Heal
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot heal for the next #b turns.

mysteryDungeon:PoisonThornsPower.NAME: Poison Thorns
DESCRIPTIONS: When Attacked, apply #b Poison to the attacker.

mysteryDungeon:ReduceHighestCostAtStartO.NAME: Lower Cost of Highest Cost Card
DESCRIPTIONS: The cost of your #b highest cost cards is lowered by one.

mysteryDungeon:RestPower.NAME: Rest
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot play cards targeting the enemy during the next #b turn(s).

mysteryDungeon:ToxicPower.NAME: Toxic
DESCRIPTIONS: Instead of decreasing by one every turn, the Poison on this enemy will increase by #b every turn.

mysteryDungeon:WorrySeedPower.NAME: Worry Seed
DESCRIPTIONS: Your card rewards will have one more card choice.

mysteryDungeon:YawnPower.NAME: Yawn
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemy will fall #y Asleep for #b turns right before they act.
